title: Mighty Good Road
description: Gwynne Heikki is in the business of salvaging. Her company wins a contract to find and salvage a lighter-than-air craft that had disappeared in the wilds on the planet of Iadara. The craft had been transporting a valuable experimental crystal matrix would make great changes to the interstellar railway currently in place. Although the job seemed "not quite right" from the beginning, Gwynne and her team take the contract.
author: Melissa Scott
